title: Arkansas Department of Health
cleaned_text: CDC COVID-19 Vaccination Program Provider Agreement Please [click here](https://redcapdhs.adh.arkansas.gov/redcap/surveys/index.php?s=ALRWJPE7YT) or use the link below to submit a COVID-19 provider agreement form to the Arkansas Department of Health. You can also [print a CDC provider agreement form here](/images/uploads/pdf/COVID-19_Vaccination_Program_Provider_Agreement_and_Profile_Form_FINAL_(1).pdf) to help you gather the necessary information, but you must enter the data into the electronic form in order to submit it to ADH. The video below has additional information about the process.
